trans-unit.target: 識別使用者介面自動化事件。

trans-unit.source: Identifiers of these types are found as fields in various classes to identify events; for example, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.InvokedEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 這些類型的識別項做為欄位找到中各種不同類別來識別事件。例如， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.InvokedEvent>。

trans-unit.source: They are also found in the event arguments passed to UI Automation clients.
trans-unit.target: 它們也位於在事件引數傳遞至使用者介面自動化用戶端。

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to create custom events.
trans-unit.target: 您不可以建立自訂事件。

trans-unit.source: In the following example event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent> in the event arguments is compared with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent> that identifies the Invoked event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例中的事件處理常式，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent>在事件引數相較於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent>可識別叫用事件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent" /> that encapsulates the specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: 擷取一個可以封裝指定之數值識別項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent" /> that encapsulates the specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: 封裝指定之數值識別項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent" />。

trans-unit.source: Normally, events are identified by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent> object.

This method can be used by UI Automation providers to create such an object when only the numerical identifier (the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A> inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) is known.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可以由使用者介面自動化提供者用來建立這類物件時唯一數字識別元 (<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A>繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) 為已知。
